scenarios.title: Dy'n Lyte
scenarios.name: dynlyte
scenarios.description: This scenario follows a group of rockers who have caught the interest of an dark ancient being. This uses the Ianus alternate universe of Cyberpunk.

scenarios.title: Got...
scenarios.name: got
scenarios.description: Investigation of a murder to determine who did it and why.

scenarios.title: Prometheus Chronicles
scenarios.name: prometheus
scenarios.description: A covert unit of of edgerunners are wanted by a medical/surgical mega-corporation for theft. Your group has been tasked with bring in what they stole and elimintating them.

scenarios.title: WNS7 News Reports
scenarios.name: wns7
scenarios.description: Some background news reports during one campaign I was running.
